description: Red Select Japanese Maple is an amazing species! It features a beautiful dense-spreading canopy with deep red-purple foliage, making it both a vibrant and attractive addition to any landscape. It is a low maintenance tree with minimal pruning or care needs. It can be grown in full sun or part shade, and prefers well-drained soil with some moisture. When its foliage changes from spring to summer, itâ€™s a true delight. This versatile tree is an ideal choice for small gardens and makes a great specimen tree or container plant. Add a Red Select Japanese Maple to your landscape and enjoy its colorful beauty for years to come.
